about_the_game:
Purchase to obtain: Bunny's Band Chest (Joan)*20, Crystal Princess Chest (Isabella)*20, Cute Lady Chest (Xiao Qiao)*20

Bunny's Band Chest (Joan)
Drops Joan related items:
SSinger Bunny (Valuable Skin)
Bunny's Mic (Valuable Primary Weapon Skin)
Bunny's Sword (Valuable Secondary Weapon Skin)
Singer Bunny Experience Card (1-Day Trial)
Bunny's Mic Experience Card (1-Day Trial)
Bunny's Sword Experience Card (1-Day Trial)
2 Skin Shards
500 Silver

Crystal Princess Chest (Isabella)
Drops Isabella items:
Crystal Princess (Hero Skin)
Crystalline Halberd (Primary Weapon Skin)
Crystalline Blade (Secondary Weapon Skin)
Crystal Brilliance (Shield Skin)
Crystal Princess (1-Day Trial)
Crystalline Halberd (1-Day Trial)
Crystalline Blade (1-Day Trial)
Crystal Brilliance (1-Day Trial)
Skin Shards x2
500 Silver

Cute Lady Chest (Xiao Qiao)
Drops Xiao Qiao related items
Sweet Baby (Hero Skin)
Honey Baby (Hero Skin)
Fatal Devotion (Primary Weapon Skin)
Heart Hunter (Primary Weapon Skin)
Sweet Death (Secondary Weapon Skin)
Thrill Love (Secondary Weapon Skin)
Deep Love (Shield)
Excessive Care (Shield)
Sweet Baby (1-Day Trial)
Fatal Devotion (1-Day Trial)
Sweet Death (1-Day Trial)
Deep Love (1-Day Trial)
2 Skin Shards
500 Silver

Please log in to the game and receive in the mail

content_descriptors.notes: Gameplay consists of graphic and realistic-looking depictions of physical conflict, weapons and depictions of human injury and death.

name: Ladies on the Battlefield

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4-Core Processor and above
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 430 or AMD HD5550
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4-Core Processor and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD7850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Purchase to obtain: Bunny's Band Chest (Joan), Crystal Princess Chest (Isabella), Cute Lady Chest (Xiao Qiao)
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Traditional Chinese*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Thai, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
*languages with full audio support
